humanum_full_description_en:
Ancient wooden boats were dug out from big trees. "Shuowen" says: "Boats, boats. The ancients used the drums together, and the woods were used as boats, and the woods were used as boats. It was impossible to help them." Xu Shen believes that in ancient times, both drums and Huodi were digging wood. Use empty boats and cut wood as oars to cross the river. The word " boat " oracle-bone inscriptions and bronze inscriptions are pictographic characters, resembling a wooden boat, with the original meaning of a boat. After the Warring States period, due to the " boat " word written with " month " shape fairly close to a lot of word " boat " and the next " month off" mixed, such as " I ", " clothing " and so on.

The word " zhou " oracle bone inscription is used as the name of the country. The handed down documents still have such use cases, such as "Guoyu. "Zheng Yu": "The bald surname is the Zhouren, and the Zhou is destroyed." Wei Zhao's note: "The bald surname is the difference between the ancestors of Peng. The Zhouren, the name of the country." Suspected " zhou " oracle bone inscriptions can also be used as sacrificial names, such as "Tunnan" 2296: "Geng Shen Bu, Zhou Liao two prisons." " Liao " is also the name of the sacrifice, " jail " refers to the cattle in captivity, so the whole sentence refers to the divination on the Gengshen Day, and the boat sacrifice and the burning sacrifice are performed with two cows. Others think that the word " boat " is used as the original meaning, such as "He Ji" 24609: "Wang Qi found a boat in the river." Yu Xingwu believes that "seeking a boat" refers to sailing along the water. Here it means that Wang Shunshui crosses the river by boat. I think " Xun " is the name of the sacrifice, and " boat " is also used as the name of the sacrifice. The Chinese character "èˆŸ" is used as the original meaning. For example, Ejun Qizhou Festival: "Tuns three boats as one voyage", which refers to gathering three ships as a group to sail. In addition, Uncle Tang and Father Ding had the term "boat dragon." Zhang Zhenghong thought it meant a boat in the shape of a dragon. The inscription of the word " zhou " can also be used as the name of a clan and a person.

" Boat " word handed down in literature can pass for " weeks ." Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Da Dong": "The son of the boatman, Xiong Feng is Qiu." Zheng Xuanjian: "The boat, treat it as Zhou."
humanum_short_description_en: Inscriptions like a boat and a ship. "Shuowen" says: "A boat, a boat."

The word " zhou" oracle bone inscription is used as the name of the country. The handed down documents still have such use cases, such as "Guoyu. "Zheng Yu": "The bald surname is the Zhouren, and the Zhou is destroyed." Wei Zhao's note: "The bald surname is the difference between the ancestors of Peng. The Zhouren, the name of the country." Suspected " zhou" oracle bone inscriptions can also be used as sacrificial names, such as "Tunnan" 2296: "Geng Shen Bu, Zhou Liao two prisons." " Liao" is also the name of the sacrifice, " jail" refers to the cattle in captivity, so the whole sentence refers to the divination on the Gengshen Day, and the boat sacrifice and the burning sacrifice are performed with two cows. Others think that the word " boat" is used as the original meaning, such as "He Ji" 24609: "Wang Qi found a boat in the river." Yu Xingwu believes that "seeking a boat" refers to sailing along the water. Here it means that Wang Shunshui crosses the river by boat. I think " Xun" is the name of the sacrifice, and " boat" is also used as the name of the sacrifice. The Chinese character " èˆŸ" is used as the original meaning. For example, Ejun Qizhou Festival: "Tuns three boats as one voyage", which refers to gathering three ships as a group to sail. In addition, Uncle Tang and Father Ding had the term "boat dragon." Zhang Zhenghong thought it meant a boat in the shape of a dragon. The inscription of the word " zhou" can also be used as the name of a clan and a person. " Boat" word handed down in literature can pass for " weeks." Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Da Dong": "The son of the boatman, Xiong Feng is Qiu." Zheng Xuanjian: "The boat, treat it as Zhou."
